text:
Created attachment 24091
File attachments for zoom bug

I inserted a chart on sheet, and running poi standalone change zoom from 100%
to 50% but when reopen file zoom function not apply.

Please help me,

Please duplicate by my attachments file. 

Thanks

Thang Nguyen.
creator: nguyenhongthangnl@gmail.com
dominik.stadler@gmx.at
text:
Sorry, there has been no update on this Bug for a long time so I assume it is either fixed or solved differently by now.

If this is still an issue for you then please reopen this bug with more information, at least some sample code that shows what you do in Java/POI code to show the problem as the xls-file alone does not tell me much about the actual problem. Ideally a self-sufficient unit-test-case allows us to reproduce the problem and thus work on a fix if still necessary.
